page.title: 12BUSINESSES
page.content: Thirteen businesses were identified in the block. Of these, two were garden nurseries, two manufactured goods and the rest were service industries. The thirteen businesses employ a total of 52 people of whom 7 are part- time. This total includes the self- employed owners. Five of the businesses have grown up on small pockets of land left by the construction of the railway and remaining derelict until recently. The businesses have started in this area either because of long-standing family ties or because of low over- heads and the pleasant rural locality. The coal merchants deliver door to door in the immediate locality while the agricultural transport firm travels as far afield as Poland.
